DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two established modality treatment kidneystones : ESWL ( extracorporal shockwave-lithotripsy ) vs. URS ( uretero-reno-scopy stone-extraction ) . Comparison stone-free rate 3month postoperative . - Trial surgical intervention
DOC.brief_title: Extracorporal Shockwave Lithotripsy Versus Retrograde Intrarenal Surgery Treatment Kidney Stones
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : kidneystones require treatment maximal size 15mm ( singular multiple kidneystones least one stone min . 5mm size ) male female patient 18 99 year informed consent sign patient explanation treatmentmodalities Exclusion criterion : age < 18 > 99 pregnancy breastfeed mother disorder blood clot kidneystones > 15mm aneurysms aorta renal artery severe skeletal deformation hamper one treatment modalities synchronous stone ipsilateral ureter stone visualize Xray sonography
